messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: SC Unschooling Confrence
messages.msgSnippet: Probably still good and warm during the day, cooler at night! Myranda Whats the weather like in SC in October? Do we bring winter woolies or must we be
messages.messageBody:
Probably still good and warm during the day, cooler at night!
Myranda

Whats the weather like in SC in October? Do we bring winter
woolies or must we be prepared for the summer heat?

And are we banned from the Pyjama Party if we couldn't find any?

Shyrley


"You laugh at me because I'm different. I laugh at you because you are all the same."

messages.subject: Re: SC Unschooling Confrence
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Kelly, Evelyn, Sandra, and the rest of the SC crowd...Oh God, I am not alone ...I am heading to the website to join...even if I cannot attend. Is there
messages.messageBody:
Hi Kelly, Evelyn, Sandra, and the rest of the SC crowd...Oh God, I am not
alone<GGG>...I am heading to the website to join...even if I cannot attend.

Is there anyway to get an Unschooling group in Charleston or surrounding
areas? I can't find a soul here.

Brightest Blessings,
Virginia
